verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sthuthiyinthumu yesu prabhu (2) Ma sthuthiki pathruda (2) Nityam nine aaradhinchi (2) Mahima parathumu ilalo (2) Stuthiki patruda (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ma papamulu mammu neeku Bahudoorambu jeyaga ye papamerugani prabhuva Makai siluvalo baliyaithiva Nee rakthamutho mammu kadigi nee chenthaku Cherchithiva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokasaku longipoyi nee sahavasamunu veedaga Aakasamunu veedi makai neetho sahavasa mosagithiva Parisuddhuluga mammu theerchi Parama swasthyamu nitchithiva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nireekshana leka memu nirbhagyulamai undaga Thwaraga ranai yunna prabhuva Parama nireekshana nitchithiva nee rakakai yeduru chooda Siddapatunu nosagithiva{/lang-eng}
